trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sandy Springs
There were no other sightings in Sandy Springs on or around September 16th 2013
Summary: Four spheres about 500 feet or more above our courtyard: ran for camera, gone 15 seconds later.
divs: sighting detailsi am writing to report a sighting of four ball shape objects this morning (9\16) at 8:01 am. i was finishing my walk with our dog, walking through our courtyard, when i saw four round spheres in a line. they were several hundred feet in the air, i would estimate 500 feet. they were in two sets of two and basically stationary while slowly rotating. one was reddish in color, the other three, gray. i tried taking a photo with my cellphone but could not focus, it wanted to focus on the contrails, much higher and behind. i ran the few steps inside my house to get my camera and tripod, but on my return 15 seconds later they were gone, disappearing from nearly directly overhead. i believe this would exclude the possibility of balloons. skies were clear with a few contrails at much higher altitude, i noticed little or no wind. no witnesses besides myself were around. i swear to the truthfulness of this sighting. in the attached photo, i have used photoshop to approximate the size, shape and location of the objects. the base photo was taken 5 minutes after the sighting. (on the attached form i stated "10 times that of a star" in apparent size, and also, "1\4 the size of a full moon," rather than "aspirin" as i chose here. i also indicated the actual size was larger than a basketball.)
